With prices in line with the market, careful ...

About us

Our company’s name is ALCA FOODS LTDA we have products available for export.

Our company is dedicating in the manufacturing and sales of BREAKFAST CEREALS (Corn Flakes in different presentations, extruded and laminated) in national and international markets.

Nowadays, we are one of the largest manufacturers of those products in Brazil and we supply the following segments: hotels, distributors, supermarkets, natural product stores, school snack, chocolate and granola industries.

Our products are packed in different presentations such as: plastic bag, paper box, kraft bag.

We already export our product to several countries around the world.

Also we have the largest experience in providing our clients Private Label.
